Build Unix server

Clone builds for IMO Project

  1. IMO Project clones - AIX build documentation
  2. IMO Project clones - RHEL build documentation

Standard Tenneco build ( non IMO )

  1. Perform racking / cabling as required
  2. Secure hostnames ip addresses and firewall rules if required.
  3. Build the LPAR / VM -
    1. Virtual Machines
      • Some systems are built by Wintel team -- follow this document
      • We build SAP App server VMs ( Including HANA App servers ) in the SAP VMWARE cluster
      • We build SAP HANA database VMs in the SAP HANA VMWARE cluster
    2. IBM Power LPARs
      • Standard LPAR physical or virtual
      • A virtualized Blade LPAR
    3. HPE Wintel Physical systems (DL3?0)
      • Netbackup home made appliances
  4. Install the OS
    • IBM VIOS
    • IBM VIOS installations at CDC - MP / Future DRIVE
    • IBM AIX
      • Perform Post installation Steps
    • Redhat Linux
      • Linux Post installation Steps
  5. Specific VIO and LPAR Documentation
    • taprvio140-141
    • taprvio90-91
    • peerdb99-original
    • peerdb99-mmd
    • vio20-21
    • paap3p01-mmd
    • tepr2e01-mmd
    • peerap99-mmd
    • power8-vio-cluster
